column6: COMEDY BANG BANG'S SCOTT AUKERMAN and RB SILVA follow psychologist Doc Samson as he tries to bring personal growth and inner peace to a land of RAGE-A-HOLIC HULKS! FRANK TIERI and RICHARD ISANOVE bring you a tale of murder and mayhem in the mighty Marvel Noir style! Will Wolverine discover a prominent citizen's murder...or be the next victim?! The SECRETEST, WARRIEST book around! Go ahead, name a contender. NO! YOU'RE WRONG! BUT WE LOVE YOU ANYWAYS.
column8: | artist:Richard Isanove | artist:R.B. Silva | writer:Frank Tieri | penciller (cover):Jake Wyatt
